sentence.Network_en: As a lawyer, I would deprecate any sort of legal control on gene therapy at this stage.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为律师，我会反对在现阶段对基因疗法进行任何形式的法律管制。

sentence.Network_en: Some pacifists and all militarists deprecate social and political conflicts.
sentence.Network_cn: 某些和平主义者和一切军国主义者都反对社会性和政治性的斗争.

sentence.Network_en: I strongly deprecate the use of violence by the students.
sentence.Network_cn: 我强烈反对学生们使用暴力.

PerfectNetExp.abs: depose 废除deprecate 反对,不赞成,鄙视depreciate 跌价,贬值,轻视,毁谤
字根字尾构词法.doc - 豆丁网 ... depose 废除 deprecate 反对,不赞成,鄙视 depreciate 跌价,贬值,轻视,毁谤.
词根联想记忆法词汇教程(三)|联想记忆法背单词 ... depot n. 仓库；v.容纳 deprecate v. 抨击，抗议 depreciate v. 贬值.
depot n. 仓库；v.容纳deprecate v. 抨击，抗议depreciate v. 贬值

list.abs: 译文中有体现的：是“强烈不推荐”（strongly deprecated），而没有写“一定不能”（never do not）。—菲菇＠维基食用菌协会 2007年1…
The peace - loving people deprecate war ., 爱好和平的人民反对战争.
the peace - loving people deprecate war ., 爱好和平的人民反对战争.
You should not deprecate your own worth ., 你不应该贬低你自己的价值.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the sense 'pray against'): from Latin deprecat- 'prayed against (as being evil'), from the verb deprecari, from de- (expressing reversal) + precari 'pray'

entry.def: If you deprecate something, you criticize it.

example.ex: He deprecated the low quality of entrants to the profession...
example.tran: 他对该行业中新人的低素质予以了批评。

example.ex: As a lawyer, I would deprecate any sort of legal control on gene therapy at this stage.
example.tran: 作为律师，我会反对在现阶段对基因疗法进行任何形式的法律管制。

sentences.sentence: "The teacher should not deprecate his student's efforts"
